title: Booom (K)
creator_credit: Bratislav Pojar, Peter Hollander, Kamil Pixa and Kratky Film
brief_description: An animated film taking a humorous look at a very serious subject: the global arms race. Looks at the history of aggression from caveman times to atomic missiles and the theory that might makes right.
creator_credit_for_label: Bratislav Pojar, Peter Hollander, Kamil Pixa and Kratky Film
